bill.summary:
Supporting Veteran Families Act of 2018
This bill directs the Department of Veterans Affairs (VA) to carry out a pilot program with community partners to assess the feasibility of providing intensive community care coordination and supportive services to veteran families who lack adequate access to VA services or to services provided by federal, state, or local government.
